sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-form @submit.prevent="submitForm">
    
    <n-form-item label="上下文">
      <n-input v-model:value="formData.context" placeholder="上下文"></n-input>
    </n-form-item>

    <n-form-item label="写作目标">
      <n-input v-model:value="formData.goal"  placeholder="写作目标"></n-input>
    </n-form-item>

    <n-form-item label="行文风格">
      <n-input v-model:value="formData.style"  placeholder="行文风格"></n-input>
    </n-form-item>

    <n-form-item label="情绪语气">
      <n-input v-model:value="formData.tone"  placeholder="情绪语气"></n-input>
    </n-form-item>

    <n-form-item label="受众画像">
      <n-input v-model:value="formData.audience"  placeholder="受众画像"></n-input>
    </n-form-item>

    <n-form-item label="输出要求">
      <n-input v-model:value="formData.output"  placeholder="输出要求"></n-input>
    </n-form-item>

    <n-button type="primary" @click="submitForm">提交</n-button>
  </n-form>
</template>

<script>
  import axios from 'axios';

  export default {
      name: 'MyComponent',
      data() {
          return {
              message: '', // 定义message变量，用于存储api返回的数据
              formData:{
              context:'',
              goal:'',
              style:'',
              tone:'',
              audience:'',
              output:''
          }
      }
    },

      methods: {
        handleClick() {
          axios.get('http://localhost:8003/api/response/?format=json')  //你的Django后端API的endpoint
            .then(response => {
               //在这里处理你的数据。response.data将包含你的数据。
               console.log(response.data);
               this.message = response.data.message;
            })
            .catch(error => {
               //在这里处理错误
               console.error(error);
            });
          },

        submitForm() {
          axios.post('http://localhost:8003/api/response/', this.formData)
            .then(response => {
              // 处理你后端返回的response
              console.log(response);
              this.message = response.data.message;
          })
            .catch(err => {
              console.log(err);
          });
        },
      },

      mounted() {
  }

}
</script>
